hobbits.name: Frodo Baggins
quotes: I wish the Ring had never come to me. I wish none of this had happened.
I will take the Ring to Mordor, though I do not know the way.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: A powerful artifact created by Sauron, capable of corrupting its bearer.

tools.name: Sting
tools.description: A short sword that glows blue in the presence of Orcs.

tools.name: Mithril Shirt
tools.description: A lightweight armor that is nearly indestructible, gifted by Bilbo.

hobbits.background_story: Frodo Baggins is a hobbit of the Shire who becomes the bearer of the One Ring. He is tasked with the mission to destroy the Ring in the fires of Mount Doom to prevent Sauron from conquering Middle-earth.
powers_and_abilities: Increased Perception due to the Ring

appearance.description: Frodo has the typical appearance of a hobbit: short, with curly brown hair and a round face. He is often seen wearing simple hobbit attire.

hobbits.name: Samwise Gamgee
quotes: There's some good in this world, Mr. Frodo, and it's worth fighting for.
I can't carry it for you, but I can carry you.

tools.name: Elven Rope
tools.description: A rope given by the Elves of Lothlórien, light and strong.

tools.name: Cooking Gear
tools.description: Tools for preparing meals, essential during the journey.

hobbits.background_story: Samwise Gamgee, known as Sam, is Frodo's loyal companion and gardener. He accompanies Frodo on his quest to destroy the One Ring, providing unwavering support and bravery throughout their journey.

appearance.description: Sam is a typical hobbit with a sturdy build, curly hair, and a round face. His attire is practical and suited for travel.

hobbits.name: Meriadoc Brandybuck (Merry)
quotes: We are going with you, Frodo.
I know there is not much point now in hoping. If I were a knight of Rohan, capable of great deeds... but I'm not.

tools.name: Barrow-blade
tools.description: A sword taken from the Barrow-downs, effective against the Witch-king.

tools.name: Rohan Armor
tools.description: Armor given to Merry when he served King Théoden.

hobbits.background_story: Meriadoc Brandybuck, or Merry, is a hobbit from Buckland who joins the Fellowship of the Ring. He plays a crucial role in helping to defeat the forces of darkness and demonstrates bravery and loyalty in the face of danger.

appearance.description: Merry has the typical hobbit appearance but wears armor and carries a sword, reflecting his role in the battle against evil.

hobbits.name: Peregrin Took (Pippin)
quotes: I don't want to be in a battle. But waiting on the edge of one I can't escape is even worse.

tools.name: Barrow-blade
tools.description: A sword taken from the Barrow-downs, used in the service of Gondor.

tools.name: Gondorian Armor
tools.description: Armor given to Pippin when he served Denethor in Gondor.

hobbits.background_story: Peregrin Took, known as Pippin, is a hobbit from the Shire who becomes a member of the Fellowship. He proves to be a valuable member of the team, contributing to the fight against the darkness and showing growth throughout the journey.

appearance.description: Pippin has the typical hobbit characteristics but wears armor suited for his role in Gondor, highlighting his journey from a simple hobbit to a seasoned warrior.

hobbits.name: Bilbo Baggins
quotes: I think I'm quite ready for another adventure.
It's a dangerous business, Frodo, going out your door.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: A powerful artifact created by Sauron, capable of corrupting its bearer. Discovered by Bilbo in Gollum's cave.

tools.name: Sting
tools.description: A short sword that glows blue in the presence of Orcs. Passed to Frodo.

tools.name: Mithril Shirt
tools.description: A lightweight armor that is nearly indestructible, given to Frodo.

hobbits.background_story: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit from the Shire who finds the One Ring during his adventures in 'The Hobbit.' His discovery of the Ring sets off the events that lead to the quest to destroy it.

appearance.description: Bilbo has the appearance of an older hobbit with a round face, curly hair, and often wears simple hobbit clothing. His attire reflects his adventurous past.

hobbits.name: Rosie Cotton
quotes: If I take one more step, it'll be the farthest away from home I've ever been.
hobbits.background_story: Rosie Cotton is a hobbit from the Shire who becomes Samwise Gamgee's wife. While her role is less prominent in the grand events of Middle-earth, she represents the simplicity and warmth of hobbit life.

appearance.description: Rosie has a typical hobbit appearance with a round face and curly hair. Her attire is practical and suited for life in the Shire.

hobbits.name: Smeagol
quotes: We wants it, we needs it. Must have the precious.

tools.name: The One Ring
tools.description: A powerful artifact created by Sauron, corrupting Smeagol and turning him into Gollum.

hobbits.background_story: Smeagol, later known as Gollum, was once a hobbit-like creature who was corrupted by the One Ring. The Ring's influence twisted his mind and body, leading him to become obsessed with it. His dual personality, Smeagol and Gollum, represents the conflict between his original self and the corrupted version.

appearance.description: Gollum is a twisted and emaciated version of his former self, with pale skin, large eyes, and a gaunt frame. His appearance is a result of centuries of isolation and the corrupting influence of the Ring.

hobbits.name: Deagol

tools.name: Fishing rod
tools.description: A rod used by Deagol during a fishing trip where he discovered the One Ring at the bottom of the river.

hobbits.background_story: Deagol was a Stoor hobbit who discovered the One Ring while fishing with his cousin Smeagol. Upon finding the Ring, Smeagol was immediately overcome with desire for it and killed Deagol to take it for himself. This event marked the beginning of Smeagol's transformation into Gollum.

appearance.description: Deagol appears as a typical Stoor hobbit, with a sturdy build and simple clothing. His life was cut short by the influence of the Ring.
